original_text: you can sip your vintage wines and watch your merchant ivory productions ; i'll settle for a nice cool glass of iced tea and a jerry bruckheimer flick any day of the week .
generated_text:
1. "I'll take a blockbuster over an art house film any day; give me a Michael Bay action flick and I'm set!"
2. "Forget the indie darlings, I'll stick with a Quentin Tarantino masterpiece any time!"
